utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, pick a card.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right now, memorize it. You got it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is that your card?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi there!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Hi!!

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Guess what? Ben is going to be in a TV commercial!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are you talking about?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, it's not for sure but umm, we met this guy in the park who thought Ben was really cute--y'know, which he is--so umm anyhoo, he uh, he gave us his card and told us to bring him down for this commercial he's auditioning.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! This guy is like the biggest commercial casting director in town! Ben takes one lousy walk in the park and gets an audition!! I mean, way to go Ben! Man! I've been in that park a million times and no one offered me an audition.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, it's crazy! We were just pushing Ben on the swings…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm always on the swings! What am I doing wrong?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, gotta go! Wish me luck!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Luck!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Rach, now that you're working at Ralph Lauren, can you bring me back some of those polo shirts?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh well, y'know what? I don't think if I feel comfortable stealing on my very first day…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Unwilling to steal from work, interesting.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Besides, if anybody's gonna get free stuff, it's gonna be me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay guys, way to wish me luck!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Good luck! Go get 'em!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, let's discuss Rachel's birthday. I say we throw a surprise party this weekend.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa, but her birthday isn't like for another month.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah but if we throw her a party on her birthday, then it's not a surprise.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think it's a great idea. Yeah, we could have a dinner party and just invite her close friends.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross!! We're having a surprise party for Rachel!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Done.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, great so do you want to do it together?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I would love to do it together!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They're gonna do it together.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Dude! That's my girlfriend!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What, so I gotta shut it down now?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, I gotta take off. I'm picking up Ben then we're off to the big audition.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's gonna be weird to watch some actor pretending to be Ben's dad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Weirder than watching his two moms make out?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa dad? There's a dad in the commercial?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah the dad and Ben eat soup and pretend to enjoy it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa, hey, maybe I'll go down there with ya and see if I can get an audition to play the dad. I mean who better to play Ben's father than his godfather.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're not his godfather.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! Are you kidding?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Of course I am! Okay, let's go godfather.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! I'm in, they're gonna let me audition!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? That's great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know! I know! It turns out that one of the casting ladies has actually seen me in a play, so I steered clear of her…

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Hey, that kid looks familiar.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, yeah! He's done tons of commercials. I've seen him in like Sugar Smacks, Playstation, and that one for the phone company. In fact he was so good in that one, he actually convinced me to switch phone companies. Chandler was mad….

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah well, he's not gonna get this one. Ben is way cuter than that kid. I mean look at him, look at you,

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's great. Listen, wouldn't it be great though if I got to play Ben's dad?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, you look nothing like Ben.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I look more like him than you do!

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Y'know, I don't really know you well enough for you to do that.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: So it's down to these two, Nancy I know you like this one and I think I agree. Rachel, what do you think?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well umm, that one is pretty but uh, I just, I just love this fabric Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Oh don't be sorry, that's part of your job here to give your opinions and then I take credit for them--I'm kidding.

utterance.speaker: Nancy
utterance.content: She is kidding, but don't ever disagree with her again. Okay, now I'm kidding!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, what a fun office.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: I don't know which one, but I do know I need a cigarette. So what do you say we take a break, we go outside, and we'll figure this out when we come back?

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Rachel? Do you smoke?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, my dad's a doctor and he would always tell me just horror stories……about ghosts and goblins who totally supported the princess's right to smoke.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: …and then they came back from smoking and they had made all of the decisions without me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That doesn't seem fair.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know! It's like I'm being punished for not having this disgusting, poisoning habit!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, it is the best.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean what if this keeps happening? Y'know, they'll-they'll be outside smoking, making all the decisions and I'll just be up in my office breathing my stupid clean air, y'know? And then when the day comes when Kim wants to promote one of us, who do you think she's gonna pick? Me or Smokey Smokerson?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel, you can go down there, you don't have to smoke. Just say you wanna get some fresh air.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I can do that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, or you can do the easy thing and smoke.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Rach, you wanna get some coffee?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I would love to!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh good!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I wanna go to babe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh wait, I change my mind! Okay, let's talk about the party! I have so many ideas!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, me too!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, look at that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, that's a little sketch of the cake, umm some sample menus, umm y'know what I thought we would start out with Tuscan style finger food, and for music, here's an alphabetized list of all my CDs! I've highlighted the ones that would go really good with the food.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What happened to the intimate dinner party?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, we're not doing that. Okay…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So wow, it looks like you took care of everything. Thanks a lot, co-host.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! I didn't take care of everything, there's-there's plenty of things for you to do!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Like what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Cups.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Cups? You're giving me cups?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And ice!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Cups and ice? Ooh, I get to be in charge of cups and ice? All right. Fine, okay, I will be in charge of cups and ice!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute, I can get ice at the restaurant…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I got it! Mine!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! How'd the audition go?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not so good.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute, are you doing Joey's "Audition didn't go so well. Yeah it did?"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah I am! Yeah, Ben got a second audition!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I had to teach Ross my bit because I actually didn't get a callback.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You got a callback too didn't you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah I did!

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Hey Rachel, what are you doing out here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh well, it's kinda lonely up there, so I just thought I would come out here and get some fresh air.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Nancy and I were talking about the fall collection.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh great!

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: So anyway we really… Honey, we're just smoking all over you.

utterance.speaker: Nancy
utterance.content: Oh, sorry!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh that's okay.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: No-no-no, we'll move you just stay right there.

utterance.speaker: Nancy
utterance.content: So anyway I sent the designs over to Ralph and he's very excited about the line.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Oh that's great! You are the best!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me, can I, can I bum one of those? Y'know what, actually… Okay, okay, okay, what's so funny over here?

utterance.speaker: Nancy
utterance.content: I thought you didn't smoke.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I thought you guys meant marijuana cigarettes, y'know? Y'know what I mean, like dubbies? And I actually, I thought to myself, "Wow, those guys are crazy!" But no, I actually smoke the regular ones all, all the time.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: We get high.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, me too.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: I'm kidding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, me too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh God, this is so nerve wracking! How-how do you do this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, unfortunately, I don't get many callbacks so…

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Is it a good sign that they asked us to hang around after the audition?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who knows?

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Okay uh, we have narrowed it down to Raymond, Ben, Kyle, and Joey. The rest of you, thank you very much.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes!! I knew it!! Bye-bye! So long! Later!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh this is great! I might actually get to play Ben's dad!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Actually, that can't happen. Yeah because you all have such different looks, we're putting you with Raymond and Kyle with Ben. So it'll be either you two or you two.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, this is gonna be kinda weird.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, it is.

utterance.speaker: Kyle
utterance.content: Yeah. It's gonna be weird.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, we-we're gonna be like best friends, that's why it's gonna be weird.

utterance.speaker: Kyle
utterance.content: Oh, oh, I thought we were just talking.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross and Chandler
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Is it okay if I leave this stuff here 'til Rachel's birthday party?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ah sure. What's in 'em?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, cups.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh good, because uh we got Rachel 800 gallons of water.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Seriously that's a lot of cups.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah well, that's 'cause Monica put me in charge of cups and ice, and Monica is gonna rue the day that she put me in charge of cups and ice.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know I rued the day once…didn't get a whole lot else done.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, time to bring up the rest of the cups. Oh, hi Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs! Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross good, I'm uh glad you're here. I wanna talk to you about something.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I've been thinking about this whole commercial thing, y'know me going up against Ben, the two of us competing, and that can't lead to anything good. So, I think I'm just gonna step aside. I'm gonna tell them that I won't audition.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow, uh, Joey that's-that's great. Thanks man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's it? You're-you're gonna let me do this?! This-this is my career we're talking about here!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, you just…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I just said that so you wouldn't let Ben do it! Look Ross, if anyone should step aside it should be Ben!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? Chandler! Tell 'em!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well I mean, let me get the door first. Oh, hi! No one.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why should Ben step aside? It was his audition in the first place! You-you just tagged along! You're like the uh, tag-a-long dad.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: At least I care about his feelings!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Do you know how hard this is gonna be on him when he doesn’t get it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And why wouldn't he get it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, come on! Have you seen what my kid can do?! Huh?! I mean he dials phones! He-he-he eats tortilla chips! He-he plays soccer with the cartoon tiger!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you saying your kid eats soup better than my kid?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You just give him a spoon baby!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah? I guess we'll just see!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Because this commercial belongs to me and Mitch!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're kid's name is Raymond!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?! So's yours!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How did work go?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh it was great! It was great! I went down there just like you said, y'know? And we talked business. Kim totally took my opinions.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You stink!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I'm-I'm serious!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well-well that's 'cause I went down there and they were all smoking. This is actually the smell of success.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, there's something different though--Oh my God! You smoked!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I did not!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes you did! You look happy and sick; you smoked!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, fine! But I had too! I had to do it for my career!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I wish I had smoked for my career…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's so gross!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No well, no it's not that bad, y'know? I mean yeah, my tongue feels a little fuzzy and these fingers sort of smell, I actually feel like I can throw up.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, but you gotta push past this because it is about to get so good!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler! I have to tell you, you smell so smokey I have to get up. I'm not kidding.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think you smell great!

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: So, we're decided, no on plaid, yes on pink?

utterance.speaker: Nancy
utterance.content: Absolutely!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I am so on board!

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Rachel didn't you just light that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I did, but y'know what? I am really, really trying to cut back, y'know? Good luck, Rach.

utterance.speaker: Nancy
utterance.content: I've actually been thinking about quitting lately.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Oh sure, every Sunday night I'm telling myself I'm quitting but every Monday morning it's like

utterance.speaker: Nancy
utterance.content: Tell me about it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well then let's just quit! We'll just quit! Let's all quit!

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: It does sound appealing.

utterance.speaker: Nancy
utterance.content: Oh, I never could do it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh but you could. You can. Absolutely! We can help each other out! We can get--what are those--those patches! We could be like the Patch Sisters!

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Oh y'know, we really should quit. Okay, let's quit!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes! Great! Give me those cigs! Give it! Give it!

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: My late husband gave me that lighter. I'm not kidding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay then!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hmmm, soup! Hmm soup! Hmm, soup!

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Joey, Ross is gonna be here any second, would you mind watching Ben for me while I use the ladies' room?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, no problem.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi Ben! So you wanna be an actor huh? I gotta tell ya, it's no picnic. There's tons of rejection. No stability. One day you're Dr. Drake Remoray, the next day you're eating ketchup right out of the bottle.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ben! I mean, Ben! Ben!

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Okay, Raymond, Joey you're up.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Okay, uh well, let's try one. Whenever you guys are ready.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Is there a problem?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well this is noodle soup and uh, I've been working with tomato. But that's okay, no problem. No problem. Hmm, noodle soup.

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Y'know, that's-that's fine, but the line is, "Hmm, soup."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, what did I say?

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Hmm, noodle soup.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How's that different? Oh! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: All right, let's try one.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hmm, noodle soup.

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Okay. Let's do it again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hmm, soup. I mean, noodle soup. I mean soup!

utterance.speaker: Raymond
utterance.content: COME ON!!!!

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Y'know what? We need to move on.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No! I-I can do it one more time! See? Look! Hmm, noodle soup. Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Hey-hey-hey!!

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Uh-oh, busted!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on you guys! What are doing?! I thought we were the patch sisters!

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Yeah. That didn't work out.

utterance.speaker: Nancy
utterance.content: Rachel we tried to quit, but it was too hard!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well y'know if you, if you started smoking again you could've at least told me! Come on, give me one of those! What are we talking about?

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: No. No! You're doing great! Don’t you give up! That's why we didn't tell you and we're not gonna drag you down with us.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh wait, no-no-no! Drag me down. Drag-drag me down.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Forget it Rachel! We're both so proud of how well you're doing. I'm not gonna let you blow it. In fact, if I catch you with a cigarette, you're fired. So go on, get out of here! Go on, I don't want you breathing this stuff! Go on!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: So, okay! So you'll come with me on the Paris trip.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh man!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Check it out! Cup hat! Cup banner! Cup chandelier! And the thing that started it all, the cup!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Great job with the cups, Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don't you just go out with her!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And did you notice the ice? Look! We have it all! We have crushed! Cubed! And dry! Watch! Ahhh! Mystical!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Awesome!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler! Everyone--no one's eating my Tuscan finger food 'cause they're all filling up on Phoebe's snow cones!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There are snow cones! Snow cones! Yuck!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know…go! Go! Right there!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you! Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, look! Look! Look!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Surprise!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! What?! My birthday's not for another month!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's the surprise!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! You guys this is so great! I mean it's so unexpected! I mean Chandler's birthday is even before mine!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Surprise!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! This is great! Look at all these cups! This is so weird.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I was in charge of cups.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, okay, not so weird.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen man, uh, I'm sorry the audition didn't go so well.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah right!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No really, I-I am! I feel bad!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah? Well look Ross, you don't have to. Okay? It's not your fault I suck. I mean what kind of an actor can't even say, "Hmm, noodle soup."

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah y'know what? Maybe-maybe you didn't mess up your audition because you suck, maybe you messed up because you care more about uh, your godson.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What you do mean?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think, sub-consciously…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wait-whoa-whoa, you lost me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think on some level, you-you sabotaged your own audition so that Ben would get the part.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, you're way sounds a lot better than mine. Yeah. Yeah! It's not that I'm a bad actor…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, it's just ah, I care so damn much about little Ben that uh, it was more important to see him succeed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There you go. Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you! So, did-did he get it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Eh, what are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, hi! Excuse me, is uh Rachel Green here? I was supposed to meet her for lunch.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: Oh, she doesn't come down here any more. You can find her up on ten.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, great.

utterance.speaker: Kim
utterance.content: So we talked about the whole presentation yesterday at lunch and he wondered if one person would be enough to get a take on the trip and I said, "Yeah, absolutely!"

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'll catch you guys later.
